title: Strategies for Mitigating Barriers to Self-Directed Online Science Learning (SPOL)

context.additional_context: Provision of personalized feedback based on learning analytics and design of microlearning content optimized for mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can write self-reflection reports using learning analytics with over 80% accuracy within one week.
Learners can achieve over 70% weekly learning goal completion rates using a learning progress dashboard.
Learners can improve their learning strategies three or more times through peer feedback systems and AI tutoring.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
